info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:35PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...SLOW MOVING THUNDERSTORMS EXPECTED TO DEVELOP OVER MICHAUD CREEK AND ROSS FORK WILDFIRES THROUGH 300 PM MDT... At 131 PM MDT, Doppler radar was suggesting that thunderstorms will likely develop over the Michaud Creek and Ross Fork Wildfires near Pocatello through 300 PM. HAZARD...Heavy rain, wind gusts to 35 mph, and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Watch for enhanced runoff or flash flooding in otherwise dry washes and gullies. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, Chubbuck, Inkom, Portneuf Gap, Fort Hall Townsite, Fort Hall Mount Putnam, Fort Hall Lincoln Creek Lodge, Fort Hall Bannock Creek Lodge, Pocatello Airport, Fort Hall Putnam Lodge and Mink Creek Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Fire crews working near active fires should prepare for strong, gusty and erratic thunderstorm outflow winds that will increase fire behavior. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. Fire crews should move to safety zones immediately.
